### Tender Description

Correctional Service of Canada is seeking a professional to provide Aftercare Psychology Services for the London Area Parole Offices in Ontario.

### Nature of Requirement

This tender seeks a professional to provide essential and non-essential mental health and/or psychological assessment services as a registered psychologist in Ontario. The successful provider will be required to provide treatment services to offenders, focusing on reduction of risk to reoffend and amelioration of the offender's mental health and emotional or behavioral functioning. Treatment will be based on evidence-based practices with proven application to offender populations.

### Deliverables

- The successful provider will deliver a minimum of 110 hours of psychological assessment or treatment services per year.
- All services provided must meet federal and provincial legislation, standards, and practice guidelines.

### Contract Duration

The contract is set to last one year, from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025, with options to renew for two additional one-year periods.

### Notice to Bidders

Tenders can be downloaded on the Canada Buys website, and the Crown reserves the right to negotiate with the successful bidder.

### Procurement Method

This tender will be awarded through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process, and the contract entitlement will be awarded to the lowest price compliant bidder.
